input_email_body:
Subject: Query for Billing Integration Options on SaaS Platform

I am writing to inquire about the billing integration options available on your SaaS platform. Could you provide details on the various plans and pricing models? I would appreciate it if you could also inform me about any discounts or promotions that may be available You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. Additionally, could you let me know about the security measures that are in place to protect customer data? Thank you for your time and assistance My name is Elena Ivanova.. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
